H0.text: What parliamentary seat was not contested on 6 May in the UK general election due to the pre-election death of a candidate. Nigel Evans

H1.text: What parliamentary seat was not contested on 6 May in the UK general election due to the pre-election death of a candidate. David Amess

H2.text: What parliamentary seat was not contested on 6 May in the UK general election due to the pre-election death of a candidate. James Brokenshire

H3.text: What parliamentary seat was not contested on 6 May in the UK general election due to the pre-election death of a candidate. John Boakes

A4.text: The UKIP candidate for Thirsk and Malton—John Boakes—died, causing the election in the constituency to be postponed until 27 May.
